taxon.author: (O. Pickard-Cambridge, 1875)
taxon.distribution: Europe, Macaronesia, North Africa to Kyrgyzstan. Introduced to USA, Chile, Argentina, Kenya, South Africa, Australia, New Zealand

referenceObject.reference: Pickard-Cambridge, O. (1875e). Notes and descriptions of some new and rare British spiders. Annals and Magazine of Natural History (4) 16(94): 237-260, pl. 8.
